item.title: CVE-2024-30243|2024-03-28T04:33:22.419Z -- Tomas -- WordPress Tooltips
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Tomas WordPress Tooltips.This issue affects WordPress Tooltips: from n/a before 9.4.5.
